Detailed Description

This class implements a message string. It can be used to create messages string that can be used to output errors and other issues.

Author
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino.nosp@m.@icm.nosp@m.c.usp.nosp@m..br)
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)
